Text: Abo ku ma ma tʼe̩ne̩ du e̩ne̩ n atene mi me̩;
U fʼo̩wo̩-mi nadala jo̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩
ma chʼamone̩ ku ma jo̩ eju-mi achʼe̩wñ ki abi mi eju o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩,
ku ma la gugu ugbo ojinoji,
kʼama kakini, Uwe̩ kate ki dago o̩wo̩ʼka o̩mo̩,
Go, orubutu-wñ che̩ko̩ jʼo̩gba-mi:
udu e-me̩ onugo manyʼudu kʼamata-me̩ fe̩;
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼugbe̩ʼka kwefu Jeko̩b dufu,
Sharo̩n amud okije̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini,
I muda chʼame̩ ku me̩ hiu Jihofa tinyo̩,
omi la adʼo̩jo̩ che me̩ ñw o̩kwo̩chageli,
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini;
go, amadu-mi akeli taa todu e̩do̩-ma ki bo̩,
Ame̩ la atʼodu-me̩ no̩ tane̩ ñw abo-mi kʼu chi kʼi chʼoli ina ñw ma,
Todabe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki neku kʼO̩jo̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw u ojane̩ le̩,
Todu go, nanyi efojale efojale etito̩
E̩do̩-me̩ ki bo̩, me̩ ki la gwoguyo̩ ogbegbele̩
Tak u nagwoguyo̩ efu Je̩rusale̩m,
O̩me̩kpa ki ajʼo̩jo̩ pe̩ tak i dabi
Ma la akʼunyi ku ma adodo ef uwñ;
Ama ako̩ kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ awa dodo ef uwñ n;
Ama achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ tinyo̩ ofofo n,
O̩gba taku ma dʼudo̩, omi adohi,
O̩gu kpʼo̩mala ajo̩ ajije̩,
